Description: To settle a Clean Air Act case Tempa Electric agreed to spend $3 million on emission controlks, pay a $3.5 million civil penalty and spend at least $10 million on environmental projects.
Agency: Justice Department Environment and Natural Resources Division
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/archive/opa/pr/2000/February/085enrd.htm
